timeline.message: update netty version to 4.1.45.Final and related tcnative version
update netty and tcnative version in release LICENSE

timeline.bodyText: Please check if these two dependencies is used. If not used, delete it.
timeline.author: liubao68
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText:
netty-transport-native-epoll exists in our pom file, but it was excluded by exclusion tag, so we can say we don't use it.
netty-transport-native-unix-common we don't use it.
replies.author: chenxingwei-wayne
